@Techs: There's 2 classes available for backfill in the next 24 hours:

 - February 2, 6PM - Test Class (4 seats available, $5 cost): https://protohaven.app.neoncrm.com/eventReg.jsp?event=1234&

 - February 3, 6PM - Test Class No Supply (4 seats available, $0 cost): https://protohaven.app.neoncrm.com/eventReg.jsp?event=5678&

You can pay at the front desk via Square (select "Walk-In (3 Hr Class / add price)", set to the cost listed above, charge as normal)

Reply to this message if you're interested in filling a slot. First come, first served!
